query.name: net.cdolinc.enrollment.school.forms
query.description: Returns List of Enrollment forms avilalbe at the school. Does not include Pre-enrollment forms
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT u_fb_form.id, u_fb_form.form_title FROM u_fb_form INNER JOIN u_fb_form_sharing ON u_fb_form.id = u_fb_form_sharing.form_id WHERE u_fb_form.publish = 'true' AND u_fb_form.form_type = 'P' AND u_fb_form_sharing.share_type = 'school' AND (u_fb_form_sharing.share_value = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0) ORDER BY u_fb_form.form_title

query.name: net.cdolinc.enrollment.pending.counts
query.sql: SELECT u_p_198789_forms.element_198856, (u_p_198789_forms.element_198856 + 1990) || '-' || (u_p_198789_forms.element_198856 + 1991) AS calendar_year, COUNT(u_p_198789_forms.id) AS total FROM u_p_198789_forms WHERE u_p_198789_forms.approval_status = 'Pending' AND (u_p_198789_forms.pendingfirstchoiceschool = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0) GROUP BY u_p_198789_forms.element_198856 ORDER BY u_p_198789_forms.element_198856 DESC

query.name: net.cdolinc.enrollment.form.submissions
query.description: Returns student ID and form status
query.sql: SELECT u_fb_form_response.student_id, u_fb_form_response.u_fb_form_id, u_fb_form.form_title, CASE WHEN u_fb_form_response.approval = 1 THEN 'Approved' WHEN u_fb_form_response.approval = 0 THEN 'Pending' WHEN u_fb_form_response.approval = 2 THEN 'Rejected' ELSE 'Unknown' END AS approval_status, CASE WHEN u_fb_form_response.response_type = 'A' THEN 'Admin' WHEN u_fb_form_response.response_type = 'G' THEN 'Guardian' WHEN u_fb_form_response.response_type = 'S' THEN 'Student' WHEN u_fb_form_response.response_type = 'T' THEN 'Teacher' ELSE 'Unknown' END AS response_type, u_fb_form_response.created_on, u_fb_form_response.created_by, u_fb_form_response.school_id, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM u_fb_form_response.created_on) || '-' || (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM u_fb_form_response.created_on) + 1) AS calendar_year FROM u_fb_form_response INNER JOIN u_fb_form ON u_fb_form_response.u_fb_form_id = u_fb_form.id INNER JOIN students ON u_fb_form_response.student_id = students.id WHERE u_fb_form_response.u_fb_form_id = :formId AND (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM u_fb_form_response.created_on) = :yearStart OR :yearStart = 0) AND (u_fb_form_response.school_id = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0) AND (u_fb_form_response.approval = :approvalStatus OR :approvalStatus = -1) AND u_fb_form_response.id >= 0 ORDER BY u_fb_form_response.student_id, calendar_year DESC

query.name: net.cdolinc.enrollment.pre.submissions
query.sql: SELECT u_p_198789_forms.element_198820 AS first_name, u_p_198789_forms.element_198830 AS last_name, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(u_p_198789_forms.element_198828) = 'M' THEN 'Male' WHEN TO_CHAR(u_p_198789_forms.element_198828) = 'F' THEN 'Female' ELSE TO_CHAR(u_p_198789_forms.element_198828) END AS gender, u_p_198789_forms.element_198822 AS DOB, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(u_p_198789_forms.element_198832) = -2 THEN 'PreSchool' WHEN TO_CHAR(u_p_198789_forms.element_198832) = -1 THEN 'PreSchool' WHEN TO_CHAR(u_p_198789_forms.element_198832) = 0 THEN 'Kindergarten' ELSE TO_CHAR(u_p_198789_forms.element_198832) END AS grade_level, u_p_198789_forms.submissiondate AS sub_date, schools.name FROM u_p_198789_forms LEFT JOIN schools ON u_p_198789_forms.pendingfirstchoiceschool = schools.school_number WHERE u_p_198789_forms.approval_status = 'Pending' AND u_p_198789_forms.element_198856 = :yearId AND ( u_p_198789_forms.pendingfirstchoiceschool = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) ORDER BY u_p_198789_forms.submissiondate DESC

query.name: net.cdolinc.enrollment.student.info
query.summary: CDOL: Student information to match forms
query.description: Returns student data needed to add to forms
query.sql: SELECT students.id, students.dcid, students.student_number, students.first_name, students.last_name, students.dob, students.gender, students.grade_level, students.sched_nextyeargrade, students.schoolid, schools.name as school_name, students.next_school, nxtsch.name as next_school_name FROM students LEFT JOIN schools ON students.schoolid = schools.school_number LEFT JOIN schools nxtsch ON students.next_school = nxtsch.school_number WHERE students.id IN (:studentIds)
